Text: Hi, I guess that this is for USA only, not yet Europe?
No crack needed, USA / Canada North American version.
How do I burn Mappoint 2006 to cd. I don't know what files to put on what cd since its 1.2 gigs. THANKS!!!
Could anyone help me out on how i can download the 1.2 gig file? When i click on download this torrent, all i get is a file which i cannot make any sense of.
how do i install or burn it. since there are no .cue files i dont know where each cd starts and stops. should i just run the setup in minimal mode and let it run.
Just burn all files to a DVD. It should autorun and work fine.
Please keep seeding. Is this the North America? I really need this.

The North America version of MapPoint 2006 freaks out on the setup unless the setup volume name is GEO13NA.  I burned it in ISO mode, I'm not sure if UDF mode will have different results.

You can thank Microsoft for this fix, they describe exactly how to fix this problem in Help and Support Center article: http://support.microsoft.com/kb/914346/en-us

Thanks! cal653.

Thanks for the fix blio.
